name: Christmas Delivery (Frozen Well Studios)
description:
This is my entry for #christmasjam

Help Santa keep the Christmas spirit alive by delivering presents down the chimneys.

Don't drop presents down chimneys with fires or they will get destroyed

Desktop Controls

Use the WASD keys to move your sleigh

Press space to drop a present

Mobile Controls

Use on screen joystick to move and press anywhere on the right of screen to drop presents
